verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let Your living water
flow over my soul,
Let your Holy Spirit
come and take control,
Of every situation that
has troubled my mind,
All my cares and burdens
on to you I roll.
Father, Father, Father.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give your life to Jesus,
let Him fill your soul,
Let Him take you in His arms
and make you whole,
As you give your life to Him,
He'll set you free,
You will live and reign
with Him eternally.
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come now Holy Spirit
and take control,
Hold me in your loving arms
and make me whole,
Wipe away all doubt and fear
and take my pride,
Draw me to your love
and keep me by your side.
Spirit, Spirit, Spirit.

verse.name: v4
